column7: Cypher Logic:  CREATING DIRECTIONAL RELATIONSHIP (i.e. edge) BETWEEN MATCHING  [source_label].[source_property] and [target_label].[target_property] as per below:
where purchase.EntityRef_value  MATCHES  bill.VendorRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PURCHASE_BILL'
where purchase_order.VendorRef_value  MATCHES  bill.VendorRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PURCHASE_ORDER_BILL'
where vendor.Id  MATCHES  bill.VendorRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'VENDOR_BILL'
where payment.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  invoice.CustomerRef_value , CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PAYMENT_INVOICE'
where refund.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  invoice.CustomerRef_value , CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'REFUND_INVOICE'
where sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  invoice.CustomerRef_value , CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'SALES_RECEIPT_INVOICE'
where customer.Id  MATCHES  invoice.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'CUSTOMER_INVOICE'
where time_activity.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  invoice.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'TIME_ACTIVITY_INVOICE'
where refund.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES   payment.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'REFUND_ PAYMENT'
where sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES   payment.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'SALES_RECEIPT_ PAYMENT'
where customer.Id  MATCHES  payment.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'CUSTOMER_PAYMENT'
where time_activity.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  payment.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'TIME_ACTIVITY_PAYMENT'
where purchase_order.VendorRef_value  MATCHES  purchase.EntityRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PURCHASE_ORDER_PURCHASE'
where vendor.Id  MATCHES purchase.EntityRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'VENDOR_PURCHASE'
where invoice.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  refund.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'INVOICE_REFUND'
where payment.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  refund.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PAYMENT_REFUND'
where sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  refund.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'SALES_RECEIPT_REFUND'
where customer.Id  MATCHES   refund.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'CUSTOMER_ REFUND'
where time_activity.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  refund.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'TIME_ACTIVITY_REFUND'
where invoice.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'INVOICE_SALES_RECEIPT'
where payment.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PAYMENT_SALES_RECEIPT'
where refund.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'REFUND_SALES_RECEIPT'
where customer.Id  MATCHES  sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'CUSTOMER_SALES_RECEIPT'
where time_activity.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'TIME_ACTIVITY_SALES_RECEIPT'
where employee.Id  MATCHES  time_activity.EmployeeRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'EMPLOYEE_TIME_ACTIVITY'
where invoice.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  customer.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'INVOICE_CUSTOMER'
where payment.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  customer.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PAYMENT_CUSTOMER'
where refund.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  customer.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'REFUND_CUSTOMER'
where sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  customer.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'SALES_RECEIPT_CUSTOMER'
where time_activity.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  customer.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'TIME_ACTIVITY_CUSTOMER'
where time_activity.EmployeeRef_value  MATCHES  employee.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'TIME_ACTIVITY_EMPLOYEE'
where bill.VendorRef_value  MATCHES  vendor.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'BILL_VENDOR'
where purchase.EntityRef_value  MATCHES  vendor.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PURCHASE_VENDOR'
where purchase_order.VendorRef_value  MATCHES   vendor.Id, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PURCHASE_ORDER_ VENDOR'
where invoice.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  time_activity.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'INVOICE_TIME_ACTIVITY'
where payment.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  time_activity.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'PAYMENT_TIME_ACTIVITY'
where refund.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  time_activity.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'REFUND_TIME_ACTIVITY'
where sales_receipt.CustomerRef_value  MATCHES  time_activity.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'SALES_RECEIPT_TIME_ACTIVITY'
where customer.Id  MATCHES  time_activity.CustomerRef_value, CREATE directional relationship from source to target relationship named 'CUSTOMER_TIME_ACTIVITY'
